item.title: Update Card Rfid
item.description: Instructions for entering RFID card information # Step 1 - Prepare # List of drivers with information: Full name, License 1 RFID read-write device, using S400 / S400E device that still works online RFID card, make sure the number of cards is enough compared to the number of Drivers. Step 2 - Set up card information # Turn on the RFID reader, make sure it’s online and in your account Place the card on the device Send the card setting command to the device according to the syntax qcvn31rfidcard,write,<Ten_Lai_Xe>,<So_GPLX># After sending the confirmation command successfully, lift the card and reset it so that the device can receive the card’s content Go to Manage > Send command to execute orders.

item.title: Update Firmware
item.description: How to update Firmware for GoTrack GPS Trackers ? #
